content: This section lets you manage MCP servers for AI chats within rooms. You can enable system MCP servers or add custom ones to meet your company's needs. Once enabled, these servers will be accessible to other users for their tasks.

comment.text: This text explains how to configure MCP servers for AI chat functionality within rooms. It appears as a description within the AI settings section, guiding users on enabling system servers or adding custom ones for company-specific needs. Translators should convey the purpose of managing AI chat server access.
